basics.name: Allen Gooch
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Senior software engineer with systems programming, applications development, and technology leadership experience over full lifecycle of large-scale distributed systems, massively-multiplayer, and peer-to-peer games.

work.summary: Developed server infrastructure for 'Star Wars: The Old Republic', a massively-multiplayer online role-playing game, and other titles.
highlights: Led design and implementation of system for collection and real-time querying of metrics exported by game services.
Led design and implementation of system for configuration, provisioning, and control of game services and hosts.
Ported MMO engine and supporting technologies used by MMO game services from 32-bit Windows platform to 64-bit Linux platform.
Managed team responsible for tooling, configuration and control of MMO game services.
Led design and implementation of custom matchmaking system.

work.summary: Lead multiplayer engineer responsible for multiplayer technology for unannounced title on Xbox 360 and PS3 consoles.
highlights: Worked with design and art in creating a fun and rewarding console multiplayer experience.
Created schedules, tasking for multiplayer engineering team.
Assisted Blacksite: Area 51 team with user interface, matchmaking, TCR/TRC, and Xbox Live programming tasks.
Performed evaluation of Quazal matchmaking middleware solution for use by Midway Studios.
